channel.title: Login Box
channel.description:
I got a new source and client recently, so I figured it was time for a BG change.
However, it seems the log in box for the client matches the BG the client came with, and completley clashes with the BG I created.
[IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq256/xxx9234/0007.png[/img]
Is there a way to make the log in box transparent, only showing the text? If not, how can I edit the log in box image?

item.title: Login Box
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

try going into your client files, and go into the sprites folder. The just delete it and itll be transparent. if that doesnt work, then its probally editted in the cache.

Read full topic
